description: Configuration for files to exclude from the merge_python_source.py script

_comments.zoho_crm_oauth_setup.py: Databricks notebook to help users set up OAuth credentials for Zoho CRM. Not part of the connector runtime.
_comments.osipi/ingest.py: Databricks notebook example for ingestion. Not part of the connector runtime.
_comments.microsoft_teams/sample-ingest.py: Databricks notebook sample for fully automated ingestion. Not part of the connector runtime.
_comments.google_analytics_aggregated/pipeline_spe: Example pipeline spec notebook. Not part of the connector runtime.
